metadata.description:
CRYPPO is an adventurous Hippopotamus Cryptonomus who has survived the significant changes in the crypto since the great eruption of the Nakamoto volcano that gave life to the great conquests and battles of the ICO era, IEO, and even the market crash, KYC and shitcoin.

Today in his NFT Valley, he faces the biggest challenge of the NFTs and the Metaverse!

A collection of 3,777 3D NFTs, AI-generated with over 90 unique traits ready for the Cryppo World Metaverse.

Collect CRYPPO to participate in the CRYPPO DAO!
metadata.name: CRYPPO #1
